isis.stitle: Body Builder Electrical Data Book for Models Built January 2001 to February 28, 2007 - International® Diamond Logic™ Electrical System Overview - Electrical System Controller (ESC)

svcproc.title: Electrical System Controller (ESC)
svcproc.para: The heart of the multiplex system is the Electrical System Controller (ESC).

The ESC communicates with the switch packs on the switch data link, controllers from other features on the power train data link and remote power modules on the body builder data link. It also receives input from various sensors and hard wire inputs throughout the truck. The ESC converts these inputs, in accordance with the programmed "rules", into data to be transmitted on the data links. It is also the power source for circuits that feed the components, controlled by the multiplexed switches, inside and outside of the cab. The primary vehicle software programming resides in the ESC.
